ai-tika-vin07t37:1_0: Discussion of the lesser training rules
ai-tika-vin07t37:2_1: Pañcasikha, knowing the Teacher’s explanation in line with the teaching, we said: ‘We shall know.’ Such a senior mendicant is going forth, but we will be extinguished with serenity and discernment.’
ai-tika-vin07t37:2_2: For this, Subhadda, the assembly of the aristocrats, brahmins, householders, and ascetics. He hears about the middle of the Buddha, and the benefit of renunciation. Then for one who is fully extinguished here, there are other monks who are competent, educated, assured, learned, have memorized the teachings, and penetrated them to that.
ai-tika-vin07t37:2_3: It’s not appropriate for you to show the senior mendicant Subhadda.’
ai-tika-vin07t37:2_4: different things, the body perishes, and the path.
ai-tika-vin07t37:2_6: They’re attached to being, taking only a priority.
ai-tika-vin07t37:3_1: ‘Let’s bind this.’ Then, when the Buddha makes a statement, he says, ‘I will undertake and implement this training.’ But if you see, you like, you should train yourself: ‘We will not undertake and implement this bas of the teaching, we will undertake and train like that. We will be consolidated in the procedure of ejection for not recognizing an offense.’
ai-tika-vin07t37:3_2: and that’s just what they did.
ai-tika-vin07t37:4_0: They must have been given to householders.
ai-tika-vin07t37:4_2: Neither rapes a tenthor, it is the wrong time, fumes, and smokes—
ai-tika-vin07t37:5_1: and mind with a mind full of lust.
ai-tika-vin07t37:6_1: He’s cut, carve, slain, and pardon.
ai-tika-vin07t37:6_2: and they didn’t go to the family.
ai-tika-vin07t37:7_0: The discussion of the lesser training rules is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t37:8_0: The chapter on the group of five hundred is finished.
